edu.umich.auth.cosign
Class CosignConfig

java.lang.Object
  edu.umich.auth.cosign.CosignConfig
public class CosignConfig
extends java.lang.Object

This singleton class is the in-memory configurations of the Cosign filter. It reads in the Cosign configuration file and monitor any change in it.

Author:
dillaman

Nested Class Summary
static interface CosignConfig.UpdateListener
          This interface provides a callback to notify registered classes whenever the config file is reloaded.
